SkillInfo.En:
Hold the bow forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
前方に向け弓を構える
空中でも発動可能

SkillCommand.Jp: 弓構え中に<KC SHOOT>を押す

SkillInfo.En:
Loose arrows while in a bow stance.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
弓構えの状態から矢を放つ
空中でも発動可能

SkillInfo.En:
After landing a hit with an arrow, the speed
of the next arrow is increased.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
矢を放った後、次の矢をつがえる速度が速くなる
空中でも発動可能

SkillCommand.Jp: 弓構え中に<KC CHANGE_MODE>を押す

SkillInfo.En: Hone your sight, and precisely aim at the enemy.
SkillInfo.Jp: 狙撃照準に切り替わり、正確に敵を狙い射てる

SkillCommand.En: <PADM>Press <KC WEAPON_MAIN><KEYM>While aiming, select with <ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> (default setting)</KEYM>.
SkillCommand.Jp: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押す<KEYM>構え中に<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>前後で選択（初期設定の場合）

SkillInfo.En:
<PADM>Hold an explosive arrow, and keep the bow pointed upwards.
<KEYM>Point the bow upwards while in a normal bow stance,
and decide the destination of the explosive arrows.</KEYM>
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
<PADM>爆薬矢をつがえ弓を上方に構える<KEYM>通常の弓構えか、上方に向ける
爆矢構えかを選択する</KEYM>
空中でも発動可能

SkillCommand.En: <PADM>Hold <KC WEAPON_MAIN>, then press <KC SHOOT><KEYM>During Explosive Stance, press <KC SHOOT></KEYM>.
SkillCommand.Jp: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押しながら<KC SHOOT>を押す<KEYM>爆矢構え中に<KC SHOOT>を押す

SkillInfo.En:
Loose an explosive arrow upwards.
The explosive arrow will detonate automatically after 
a period of time, but the damage increases by 
detonating when struck by an attack.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
爆薬矢を上方に放つ
爆薬矢は一定時間で自動起爆するが
攻撃により起爆させるとダメージが上昇する
空中でも発動可能

SkillCommand.En: <PADM>Press <KC WEAPON_MAIN><KEYM>While aiming, select with <ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> (default setting)</KEYM>.
SkillCommand.Jp: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押す<KEYM>構え中に<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>前後で選択（初期設定の場合）

SkillInfo.En:
Speed up the time it takes to prepare an
explosive arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
爆薬矢の準備動作が高速化される
空中でも発動可能

SkillInfo.En:
Kick forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
前方に蹴りを放つ
空中でも発動可能

SkillCommand.En:
While reloading arrows, press <PADM><KC TOUCH><KEYM><KC RELOAD></KEYM>
with perfect timing.
SkillCommand.Jp: <PADM>矢の装填中、特定のタイミングで<KC TOUCH>を押す<KEYM>矢の装填中、特定のタイミングで<KC RELOAD>を押す

SkillInfo.En: Quickly replenish the quiver with arrows.
SkillInfo.Jp: 矢筒に矢を高速補充する

SkillInfo.En:
Switch the type of arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
矢の種類を切り替える
空中でも発動可能

SkillCommand.En:
While climbing an enemy,
press <KC ATTACK1>.
SkillCommand.Jp: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す

SkillInfo.En:
While climbing an enemy, stab into them with
the tip of the arrow that is equipped.
The number of attacks rises with repeated button presses.
SkillInfo.Jp:
しがみついた状態から
装備中の矢の先端で突き刺す
ボタン連打で攻撃回数が増加する
